event1.title: Life of a Digital Transformation Designers will Show & Tell about their work. The Digital Transformation Designers of the Digital Society School will show and tell about their work. One can expect a variety of installations, prototypes and visualisations representing research output of last year.

event6.title: Workshop Sustainable Development Goals and Design Method Toolkit by Anneke van Woerden and Felipe Escobar

event7.title: Get Energized, Digital Society School Snacks & Energizers. An energizer is an energy-booster. It is commonly used as an ice-breaker to get to know people and meet who is around you. In a working environment, it can be used to clear everybodyâ€™s heads of negative energy and take a break. Energizers play a vital part in the SCREAM methodology developed by the Digital Society School and are a great way to create a community and safe working environment.

event8.title: Ontvangst gasten Golden Dot Award met een hapje en een drankje. Gelegenheid om de werken van genomineerden te zien.
